Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28741926]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=32 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=8 μM), Escherichia coli CGSC 5167 (MIC=0.5-1 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603 (MIC=32 μM), Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC=8-16 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=8 μM), Helicobacter pylori ATCC 43504 (MIC>80 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=32 μM), Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 208821 (MIC=8-16 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28741926] 0% hemolysis at 17 μM , 3% hemolysis at 35 μM , 30-48.6% hemolysis at 64 μM , 40% hemolysis at 100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28741926] CC50 > 64 μM against CRL-1739, CC50 = 10.3 ± 1.1 μM against MM96L, CC50 = 51.2 ± 4.0 μM against HFF-1, CC50 > 64 μM against HeLa, CC50 = 48.4 ± 0.7 μM against MCF-7, CC50 = 11.5 ± 0.6 μM against K-562, CC50 = 34.1 ± 3.9 μM against HL-60;CC50=30.8 ± 2.5μM against PBMCs.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans

Literature.Title: Redesigned Spider Peptide with Improved Antimicrobial and Anticancer Properties
Literature.Author: Sonia Troeira Henriques, Nicole Lawrence, Stephanie Chaousis, Anjaneya S. Ravipati, Olivier Cheneval,Aurelie H. Benfield, Alysha G. Elliott, Angela Maria Kavanagh, Matthew A. Cooper, Lai Yue Chan,Yen-Hua Huang, and David J. Craik
